name: univac
description: generate AST of lots of programming languages using antlr4

scripts.build: npm run clean && npx tsc && npm run copy
scripts.copy: rm -rf dist/src/grammar && mkdir -p dist/src/grammar && cp -r src/grammar/* dist/src/grammar
scripts.lint: npm run organizeImports && npm run format
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test && npm run test-js
scripts.all-publish: npm run all && git commit -a -m "version patch" && npm version patch && npm publish

author: Sebasti√°n Gurin
